title: Energy of SHM - max KE of pendulums

content.question: Pendulum <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Pendulum <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> each consist of a sphere attached to an identical string fixed to a ceiling. The sphere in Pendulum <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> has mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> and the sphere in Pendulum <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has mass <math alttext="2 m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></math>. Both pendulums are held in place at the same angular displacement from equilibrium, as shown, and released from rest, undergoing simple harmonic motion. Which of the following correctly compares the maximum kinetic energies <math alttext="K sub max comma 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub max comma 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> of Pendulum <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Pendulum <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub max comma 1, is less than, K sub max comma 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub max comma 1, equals, K sub max comma 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub max comma 1, is greater than, K sub max comma 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>max</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>
It cannot be determined without knowing the length of the strings.
